message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $15,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $13,000.  This is my final offer.
